com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.account 
    Class and Description
    AccessTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    RefreshTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.application 
    Class and Description
    OAuthApiRequestAuthenticator
    An OAuth-specific ApiRequestAuthenticator that implements the Builder design pattern to allow customization of how the authentication attempt is processed.
    OAuthPolicy
    An OAuthPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the OAuth tokens associated with an Application
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.authc 
    Class and Description
    AccessTokenResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API specifically for the purpose of obtaining a new OAuth Access Token (eg via a OAuth 2 Client Credentials Grant Type request).
    OAuthAuthenticationResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) via OAuth 2.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.account 
    Class and Description
    AccessTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    RefreshTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.application 
    Class and Description
    IdSiteAuthenticator
    Interface denoting an Id Site-specific OAuthRequestAuthenticator.
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticator
    This class is used to authenticate a Json Web Token against Stormpath.
    OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticator
    This OAuthRequestAuthenticator is in charge of executing a client credentials authentication attempt.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator
    Interface denoting a Password Grant-specific OAuthRequestAuthenticator.
    OAuthPolicy
    An OAuthPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the OAuth tokens associated with an Application
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticator
    This class is used to refresh an OAuth 2.0 token created in Stormpath.
    OAuthStormpathSocialGrantRequestAuthenticator 
    OAuthTokenRevocator
    Interface to expose the OAuth 2.0 revoke operattion.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.authc 
    Class and Description
    RequestLocation
    The possible locations in an HTTP request where an OAuth 2 bearer token may be found and used for authenticating the request.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.oauth 
    Class and Description
    AccessToken
    This interface represents an Authentication OAuth2 token created in Stormpath.
    AccessTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    BaseOAuthToken
    This is a base interface for those methods that Stormpath AccessTokens and RefreshTokens have in common.
    GrantAuthenticationToken
    A GrantAuthenticationToken instance reflects the result of executing an Authentication Request to create or refresh an AccessToken.
    IdSiteAuthenticationRequest 
    IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder
    Builder that can construct IdSiteAuthenticationRequest instances.
    IdSiteAuthenticationRequestFactory
    Factory used to construct IdSiteAuthenticationRequestBuilder instances.
    IdSiteAuthenticator
    Interface denoting an Id Site-specific OAuthRequestAuthenticator.
    IdSiteAuthenticatorFactory 
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a JWT request which can be later validated either locally or against the Stormpath Server.
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationBuilder
    A JWT-specific OAuthRequestAuthenticationBuilder.
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationFactory
    Factory used to construct OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationBuilder instances
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticationResult
    This class stores the information received after a AccessToken authentication request.
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticator
    This class is used to authenticate a Json Web Token against Stormpath.
    OAuthBearerRequestAuthenticatorFactory
    A JWT-specific Authenticator Factory.
    OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to authenticate an Account and exchange its api key and api secret for a valid OAuth 2.0 access token.
    OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder
    Utility class to build ClientCredentialsGrantRequestBuilder instances.
    OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory
    Factory used to construct OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder instances.
    OAuthClientCredentialsGrantRequestAuthenticator
    This OAuthRequestAuthenticator is in charge of executing a client credentials authentication attempt.
    OAuthClientCredentialsRequestAuthenticatorFactory
    A client_credentials Authenticator Factory.
    OAuthGrantRequestAuthentication
    Interface defining the operations supported by both OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication and OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthentication.
    OAuthGrantRequestAuthenticationResult
    Contains the resultant AccessToken and all its related properties after a successful Grant Authentication request.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to authenticate an Account and exchange its credentials for a valid OAuth 2.0 access token.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder
    Utility class to build PasswordGrantRequestBuilder instances.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationFactory
    Factory used to construct OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticationBuilder instances.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthenticator
    Interface denoting a Password Grant-specific OAuthRequestAuthenticator.
    OAuthPasswordRequestAuthenticatorFactory
    A Password Grant-specific Authenticator Factory.
    OAuthPolicy
    An OAuthPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the OAuth tokens associated with an Application
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to create new OAuth 2.0 access tokens for a previously authenticated account.
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticationBuilder
    Builder that can construct OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthentication instances.
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticationFactory
    Factory used to construct OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticationBuilder instances
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticator
    This class is used to refresh an OAuth 2.0 token created in Stormpath.
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthenticatorFactory
    A Refresh Grant-specific Authenticator Factory.
    OAuthRequestAuthentication
    Interface denoting OAuth2 Authentication Requests.
    OAuthRequestAuthenticationBuilder
    Utility class used to build OAuthRequestAuthentication instances.
    OAuthRequestAuthenticationFactory
    This interface defines the method to create a OAuthRequestAuthenticationBuilders.
    OAuthRequestAuthenticationResult
    Interface denoting OAuth2 Authentication Response obtained as a consequence of a OAuthRequestAuthentication.
    OAuthRequestAuthenticator
    Interface defining the operations that every OAuth2 Authenticator must support.
    OAuthRequestAuthenticatorFactory
    Interface to be implemented as a factory for OAuthRequestAuthenticators.
    OAuthRevocationRequest 
    OAuthRevocationRequestBuilder
    Builder class to create OAuthRevocationRequest instances.
    OAuthStormpathSocialGrantRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to authenticate an Account and exchange its providerId and accessToken (or code) for a valid OAuth 2.0 access token.
    OAuthStormpathSocialGrantRequestAuthenticator 
    OAuthStormpathSocialRequestAuthenticatorFactory 
    OAuthTokenRevocationRequestFactory
    Factory class to create OAuthRevocationRequestBuilders instances.
    OAuthTokenRevocator
    Interface to expose the OAuth 2.0 revoke operattion.
    OAuthTokenRevocatorFactory
    Factory class to create OAuthTokenRevocators instances.
    RefreshToken
    This interface represents an Authentication OAuth2 token created in Stormpath.
    RefreshTokenList
    A CollectionResource containing AccessToken instances.
    TokenTypeHint
    Enum that exposes the possible token_type_hint values for OAuth token revocation.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.oauth.authc 
    Class and Description
    AccessTokenRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates an API request attempting to obtain a new OAuth Access Token.
    AccessTokenResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API specifically for the purpose of obtaining a new OAuth Access Token (eg via a OAuth 2 Client Credentials Grant Type request).
    OAuthApiRequestAuthenticator
    An OAuth-specific ApiRequestAuthenticator that implements the Builder design pattern to allow customization of how the authentication attempt is processed.
    OAuthAuthenticationResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) via OAuth 2.
    RequestLocation
    The possible locations in an HTTP request where an OAuth 2 bearer token may be found and used for authenticating the request.
    ResourceRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates a client request to an API resource (URI) endpoint based on the presence of an OAuth Access Token in the request.
    ScopeFactory
    A ScopeFactory allows you to define application-specific scopes (aka 'permissions') granted to a successfully authenticated Account making an OAuth request.
    TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.impl.oauth.authz 
    Class and Description
    TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.

    Authenticates a client request to an API resource (URI) endpoint based on the presence of an OAuth Access Token in the request.
    ScopeFactory
    A ScopeFactory allows you to define application-specific scopes (aka 'permissions') granted to a successfully authenticated Account making an OAuth request.
    TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.
    TokenTypeHint
    Enum that exposes the possible token_type_hint values for OAuth token revocation.

  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth used by com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.filter.oauth 
    Class and Description
    AccessTokenResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API specifically for the purpose of obtaining a new OAuth Access Token (eg via a OAuth 2 Client Credentials Grant Type request).
    OAuthAuthenticationResult
    An AuthenticationResult that indicates a client authenticated with your server-side API (eg REST API) via OAuth 2.
    OAuthGrantRequestAuthenticationResult
    Contains the resultant AccessToken and all its related properties after a successful Grant Authentication request.
    OAuthPasswordGrantRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to authenticate an Account and exchange its credentials for a valid OAuth 2.0 access token.
    OAuthRefreshTokenRequestAuthentication
    This class represents a request for Stormpath to create new OAuth 2.0 access tokens for a previously authenticated account.
    TokenResponse
    Response data to be returned to an OAuth client as a result of processing a successful Client Password Authentication Request as defined in the OAuth 2 specification, Section 2.3.1.
